name: Smash The Smile!
description:
Fun 1 vs 1 arcade game to play with a friend when you are bored!

How to play: 

  • Blue player uses WASD to control, red player the arrow keys.
  • When in the air above the other player, use S or <down arrow> to shoot down and smash them. 
  • Power-ups drop every 5 seconds and when one of the players picks them up they give a random effect to that player.

Made by Herre Torensma.

Tools:

  • Godot 3.1.1
  • Aseprite
  • Audacity
  • Visual Studio Code
